title: Specialist Devops Engineer
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you. 
Key Responsibilities
 

Work collaboratively on the implementing technical designs based on discussion with team leads, development, testing, release and deployment of cloud-based infrastructure, applications and supporting systems
Working with, and supporting, the development team with application configuration for deployment, monitoring and other automation
Provide support running Linux and Windows servers and containers, including server hardening, patching, network security and log management to deliver web application and service stacks.
Ensuring that delivered work meets our defined compliance requirements and engineering best practices
Work with teams to develop code quality metrics and meters
Contribute to development and promotion of Devops best practices

Knowledge/Experience
 
Required:
Total - 8-12 Years

4+ years of experience of infrastructure operations, preferably all in a cloud infrastructure environment
2+ years of enterprise level experience with AWS
2+ years of experience working with Linux and Windows servers
1+ years of experience working with Docker, Kubernetes, Helm, and the related DevOps toolchain, ideally in a production environment
Experience using Terraform or similar tools to provision infrastructure from code
Experience with Bash shell scripting


Experience working with Agile teams
A Security first approach

Desired:

Experience maintaining ISO 27001 compliance (or equivalent security standard)
Familiarity working with various CI/CD solutions – for example, Azure DevOps, TeamCity, Jenkins, Octopus Deploy
Working with Microservices observability and monitoring tools, like Prometheus and Grafana
Enterprise level experience with relational and non-relational databases, for example, RDS MySQL, RedShift
Scripting experience with PowerShell, Ruby, Python, or GO
Any certifications to back your experience are a bonus

 About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
